WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 05 DEC
   BY M/V SUBSEA VIKING IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-31.25S 042-46.22W, 24-36.43S 042-43.75W,
   24-27.42S 042-23.30W, 24-22.53S 042-26.13W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 06 DEC 18.
